results.title: HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin ameliorates trimethyltin neurotoxicity and cognitive impairment through reversal of Alzheimer's-associated markers.
results.text_hl: The present study aimed to assess neuroprotective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@) against @CHEMICAL_trimethyltin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C046488 @@@trimethyltin@@@ (@CHEMICAL_trimethyltin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C046488 @@@TMT@@@) @<m>DISEASE_Cognitive_Dysfunction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D060825 @@@memory decline@@@ and hippocampal @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegeneration@@@.
